name: Rock Paper Scissors BATTLEGROUND
description:
This 'game' was made in about 2 hours because I was bored, and it would be a challenge for myself.  Don't get your hopes up, the gameplay is passive to say the least.

Who do you think will win? 👀

Coming soon...

  • Customisable spawn rates (uncapped)
  • Music
  • SFX volumes

(Concept inspired by livingrps)
